Job Description

  • Building and sustaining long-lasting relationships with new and existing customers based within an assigned sales territory.
  • Conduct face-to-face meetings with existing and potential customers.
  • Informing potential and existing customers of product features and benefits
  • Resolving customer complaints.
  • Submitting regular sales reports to management.

Job Requirements

  • At least 6 months' sales experience.
  • Bachelor's degree
  • Experience in telesales & Call Center & sales age

About Upper Medic

Internet/E-commerce Giza, Egypt •11-50 employees

Upper Medic is the pioneering award-winning healthcare internet company in MENA, we expert in providing internet solutions to build, manage, protect and improve our clients’ online presence and reputation.
